name: ZUBGUBBLERS
description:
Produced with the PICO-8 'fantasy console', ZUBGUBBLERS pits four players against one another in a race to dominate the playfield by painting it one's own distinctive color and pattern. Gobble powerups, avoid nefarious powerdowns, and sabotage your opponents to emerge victorious. What's a ZUBGUBBLER, you ask? I don't know!

This minimalist, abstract party game is best played with 4 gamepads. 

Code and design by Nick Santaniello (ROBYSOFT) http://www.robysoft.net

Featuring music by Devin Curry (aka Grand Atrium) https://soundcloud.com/grandatrium
